Name: IncludeObjects
Description: Indicates whether the APIObject is included in the response.

Name: IncludeResults
Description: Controls whether the results are returned in the response.

Name: OnlyIncludeBase
Description: Reduce object to base APIObject information.

Name: ResponseAddress
Description: Email address or public URL to receive POST response to asynchronous request.

Name: ResponseType
Description: Specifies type of response associated with an asynchronous operation.
